title: Comparison-table Widget
description: A comparison table widget that displays two-column comparison data with customizable icons

tableHeader.description: Header text for the comparison columns

us.description: Header text for the first column (typically represents the company's offerings)

others.description: Header text for the second column (typically represents competitors' offerings)

us.description: Text for the first column in this row

others.description: Text for the second column in this row

icons.description: Icons to be displayed next to the text in each column

checkIcon.description: URL for the icon displayed in the first column (typically a checkmark)

crossIcon.description: URL for the icon displayed in the second column (typically a cross)
